g.text: transformations that need to be applied)

g.id: link_start_Use open3d to read point cloud.\nUse numpy to turn the points to an ~8000 row array\nwith 3 columns representing x,y,z coordinates.

path.id: start-to-Use open3d to read point cloud.\nUse numpy to turn the points to an ~8000 row array\nwith 3 columns representing x,y,z coordinates.

text.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

g.id:
link_Use open3d to read point cloud.
Use numpy to turn the points to an ~8000 row array
with 3 columns representing x,y,z coordinates._Represent the points w.r.t./in the world
frame using RigidTransform.

path.id:
Use open3d to read point cloud.
Use numpy to turn the points to an ~8000 row array
with 3 columns representing x,y,z coordinates.-to-Represent the points w.r.t./in the world
frame using RigidTransform.

text.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

g.id: link_Represent the points w.r.t./in the world\nframe using RigidTransform._Convert the points back to the\nPoint cloud representation

path.id: Represent the points w.r.t./in the world\nframe using RigidTransform.-to-Convert the points back to the\nPoint cloud representation
